meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a sluggard.
meanings.sent1: His sluggardness was evident as he lounged on the couch all day.
meanings.sent2: Her sluggardness prevented her from completing her chores on time.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sluggardness, he managed to finish his homework before dinner.
meanings.sent4: The sluggardness of the snail was a reminder to take things slow sometimes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience with his students' sluggardness was truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: The sluggardness of the cat was evident as it slept all day.
meanings.sent2: Her sluggardness at work often led to missed deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The dog's sluggardness in fetching the ball made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sluggardness of the clouds moving slowly across the sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: His sluggardness in completing tasks was a source of frustration for his colleagues.
